select iid, iwebsiteid, ilanguageid, ctype, ctitle, chtmlurl, bshow, icreateuserid, dcreatedate from t_product_topic_page where
(dcreatedate >= #{startDate} and dcreatedate < #{endDate}) and
ctype = #{type} and
ilanguageid = #{languageId} and
iwebsiteid = #{siteId} and bshow = true order by dcreatedate desc
limit #{size}
